alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 7:00PM EDT until April 27 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Thomas County in south central Georgia... Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 659 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Thomasville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quitman, Thomasville, Boston, Pavo, Morven, Barwick, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Grooverville, Dillon, Everett, Merrillville, Nankin, Empress, Brooks Co A/p, Dixie, Barney, Patten, Eason, Oaklawn and Pidcock. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
